parametrized_description: A company utilizes NumVehicleTypes different vehicle types to transport patties. Each vehicle type i has a Capacity[i] capacity for patties and incurs a CostPerTrip[i] cost per trip. The number of vehicles of one type must not exceed the number of vehicles of another type. The company must transport at least MinPatties patties while staying within a Budget. The objective is to minimize the total number of trips.

Capacity.description: Capacity of each vehicle type in number of patties

CostPerTrip.description: Cost per trip for each vehicle type

MinPatties.description: Minimum number of patties to be shipped

NumTrips.description: The number of trips for each vehicle type

NumVehicles.description: The number of vehicles for each vehicle type

constraints.description: At least MinPatties patties must be transported.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(Capacity[i] * NumTrips[i] for i in range(NumVehicleTypes)) >= MinPatties)

constraints.description: The total cost of all trips must not exceed the Budget.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(NumTrips[i] * CostPerTrip[i] for i in range(NumVehicleTypes)) <= Budget)

constraints.description: The number of vehicles of one vehicle type must not exceed the number of vehicles of another vehicle type.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of trips required to transport the patties.

code.gurobipy: model.setObjective(quicksum(NumTrips[i] for i in range(NumVehicleTypes)), GRB.MINIMIZE)
